name: Recipe: Fontainian Foie Gras
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fontainian Foie Gras.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Fontainian Foie Gras
customize.desc: A traditional dish of Fontaine. The foie gras only needs to be pan-fried before being served. Thanks to the masterful temperature control, the golden-brown foie gras tastes enticingly tender. The process takes focus and concentration, or else the delicious liver might be liquefied into an oily mess.

value.text: Purchase from Sanguinetti at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine
